events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
System detected keywords related to refund and return and classified the case under Refund.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Sarah T. for further handling.
Hello! I’m Sarah and I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund efficiently, may I have the order ID and a description or photo of the incorrect item you received?
Sure, the order number is 789654123. I received a blue shirt instead of the red one I ordered, and it’s the wrong size too.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process for the incorrect item and arrange a return label for you.
That sounds good to me. Please send the return label and confirm when the refund will be processed.
We’ve emailed you a prepaid return label. Once we receive the returned item, the refund will be credited within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and that everything was satisfactory with our service.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for handling this issue quickly and professionally.
The refund case has been closed following your confirmation of receipt and satisfaction with the resolution.
